title: Basketball
description: For the ball-physic the Box2D-engine was used. Assets: Serhat Sariyilmaz (developed for smeet.com)

title: Booty Shaker
description: The user get points on press the direction exactly if the icon in the crosshair. It's playable by keyboard-keys or by the mouse (click the direction o the buttons). Assets: Serhat Sariyilmaz, Guido Bastian, Ersin Soyer (developed for smeet.com)

title: Fishing Game
description: This is a reaction game. The bigger the fish, the more difficult it is to react in time. One must also take care that you do not accidentally collect the scrap. Assets: Sebastian Adomat (developed for smeet.com)

title: Goldmine
description: The user has to search gold-nuggets with a flashlight in a short time. Assets: Serhat Sariyilmaz, Marko Schmidt (developed for smeet.com)

title: Easter Eggs
description: The user has to collect the eggs and have to hand them to the easter-rabbit. It is possible to catch special-items (more speed, faster spawn, etc.). Assets: Serhat Sariyilmaz, Oliver Pagels (developed for smeet.com)

title: Rocket Montage
description: The goal is to assign the predetermined parts of a new-years eve rocket out of the box with drag and drop in a short time. Assets: Sebastian Irmer, Serhat Sariyilmaz, Marko Schmidt (developed for smeet.com)

title: Hot-Dog
description: The goal is to provide customers with the desired hot dog and a drink in a short time. Only when the hot dog has the ingredients according to the wishes, you get the full money. Assets: Sebastian Adomat (developed for smeet.com)

title: Love-Tower
description: The aim is the tower to stack so that no items fall. The higher and slate the tower is built, the more it swing. Assets: Serhat Sariyilmaz (developed for smeet.com)

title: Lowrider
description: The user get points on press the direction exactly if the icon in the square. It's playable by keyboard-keys or by the mouse (click the direction o the buttons). Assets: Guido Bastian (developed for smeet.com)

title: Pet-Challenge
description: Is a reaction-game. The goal is the finishline without a collision. The pet can jump and crowd. Assets: Serhat Sariyilmaz, Ersin Soyer (developed for smeet.com)

title: Racing
description: This is a flee game. If you come without a collision to your destination, you have won. Assets: Serhat Sariyilmaz (developed for smeet.com)

title: Snowboard
description: A game with obstacles, where you avoid and flags that you should drive around from the correct side. The stars and ramps gives extra points. Assets: Guido Bastian, Ersin Soyer (developed for smeet.com)

title: Star Constellation
description: Is a drawing-game for zodiac signs. You have to keep the left mouse pressed at the starting point and move the cursor along the bright line. Assets: Sebastian Irmer (developed for smeet.com)

title: Roulette
description: This game is for gambling in smeet.com. The random numbers of the roulette kettle and game times are defined for security reasons by the server side. The animations and gamefield (incl. possible interactions) i had realized in Flash. Assets: Serhat Sariyilmaz (developed for smeet.com)

title: Battleship
description: Is like the pencil and paper game for 2 players. The players place their ships and then have to guess where the enemy ship is placed in alternating each player. Assets: Serhat Sariyilmaz (developed for smeet.com)

title: Dice Poker
description: Is also known as Poker Dice. This game is played with 5 dice and two or more players. Each player has a total of 3 rolls and the ability to hold dice in between rolls. After the three rolls the best hand wins. Assets: Serhat Sariyilmaz (developed for smeet.com)

title: Backgammon
description: It's the classical version for two players where playing pieces are moved according to the roll of dice, and a player wins by removing all of his pieces from the board before his opponent. Assets: Serhat Sariyilmaz (developed for smeet.com)

title: Smeetolactic
description: This roundbased Dual Player Game I even designed. It is a building strategy game. Each user has settlers who can grow with barracks. Towers used for defense and the power plants produce energy. The energy required for moving to other planets and for the construction of new buildings. Assets: Serhat Sariyilmaz, Marcus Th√∂richt (developed for smeet.com)

title: Checkers
description: Is a classical game for two players which involve diagonal moves of uniform game pieces and mandatory captures by jumping over opponent pieces. Assets: Serhat Sariyilmaz (developed for smeet.com)
